Understate: The claim may understate the impact of the surtax on small business owners by using a statistic that refers to all businesses instead of specifically small businesses.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to back up the assertion that the surtax would harm small business owners and hinder job creation.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all small business income reported on individual returns would be hit by the surtax, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the impact of the surtax on small business owners and job creation that are not considered in the claim.
